languages.text: Маражай Эзирраеш не был забыт своими приспешниками — и врагами. Ксенос, ушедший живым из Комморры, привлек внимание остатков кабала Опустошительной бури — к добру ли или к худу.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh has not been forgotten by his underlings — or his enemies. The xenos who left Commorragh alive has drawn the attention of the remnants of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — for better or for worse.
languages.original_text: Маражай Эзирраеш не был забыт своими приспешниками — и врагами. Ксенос, ушедший живым из Комморры, привлек внимание остатков кабала Опустошительной бури — к добру ли или к худу.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh has not been forgotten by his underlings — or his enemies. The xenos who left Commorragh alive has drawn the attention of the remnants of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — for better or for worse.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh has not been forgotten by his underlings — or his enemies. The xenos who left Commorragh alive has drawn the attention of the remnants of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — for better or for worse.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh has not been forgotten by his underlings — or his enemies. The xenos who left Commorragh alive has drawn the attention of the remnants of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — for better or for worse.

Marazhai Aezyrraesh has not been forgotten by his underlings — or his enemies. The xenos who left Commorragh alive has drawn the attention of the remnants of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — for better or for worse.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh n'a pas été oublié par ses subordonnés, ni par ses ennemis. Le xénos qui est parvenu à quitter Commorragh en vie a attiré l'attention des survivants de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse... pour le meilleur ou pour le pire.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh has not been forgotten by his underlings — or his enemies. The xenos who left Commorragh alive has drawn the attention of the remnants of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — for better or for worse.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh n'a pas été oublié par ses subordonnés, ni par ses ennemis. Le xénos qui est parvenu à quitter Commorragh en vie a attiré l'attention des survivants de la Kabale de la Tempête ravageuse... pour le meilleur ou pour le pire.

languages.text: 玛拉斋·艾泽拉什的命运并没有被人遗忘，无论是他的下属还是他的敌人都留意到了他。这位活着离开科摩罗的异形，已经引起了狂风阴谋团残党的注意，不知道这究竟是好是坏。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh has not been forgotten by his underlings — or his enemies. The xenos who left Commorragh alive has drawn the attention of the remnants of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — for better or for worse.

traits.locale_text: 玛拉斋·艾泽拉什的命运并没有被人遗忘，无论是他的下属还是他的敌人都留意到了他。这位活着离开科摩罗的异形，已经引起了狂风阴谋团残党的注意，不知道这究竟是好是坏。

languages.text: マラズハイ・アエジレシュは自分の部下から…敵から忘れられていなかった。生きてコモラフを去った異種族は、良くも悪くも、略奪の嵐陰謀団残党から目を付けられていた。
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh has not been forgotten by his underlings — or his enemies. The xenos who left Commorragh alive has drawn the attention of the remnants of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — for better or for worse.

traits.locale_text: マラズハイ・アエジレシュは自分の部下から…敵から忘れられていなかった。生きてコモラフを去った異種族は、良くも悪くも、略奪の嵐陰謀団残党から目を付けられていた。

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh wurde von seinen Untergebenen nicht vergessen — und auch von seinen Feinden nicht. Der Xenos, der lebendig aus Commorragh entkommen ist, hat die Aufmerksamkeit der Kabale des plündernden Sturms geweckt — oder was davon übrig ist.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh has not been forgotten by his underlings — or his enemies. The xenos who left Commorragh alive has drawn the attention of the remnants of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — for better or for worse.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh wurde von seinen Untergebenen nicht vergessen — und auch von seinen Feinden nicht. Der Xenos, der lebendig aus Commorragh entkommen ist, hat die Aufmerksamkeit der Kabale des plündernden Sturms geweckt — oder was davon übrig ist.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh no ha sido olvidado por sus subordinados... ni por sus enemigos. El xenos, que salió con vida de Commorragh, ha atraído la atención de los restos de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora, para bien o para mal.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh has not been forgotten by his underlings — or his enemies. The xenos who left Commorragh alive has drawn the attention of the remnants of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — for better or for worse.

traits.locale_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh no ha sido olvidado por sus subordinados... ni por sus enemigos. El xenos, que salió con vida de Commorragh, ha atraído la atención de los restos de la Kábala de la Tempestad Asoladora, para bien o para mal.

languages.text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh, ne astları ne de düşmanları tarafından unutulmadı. Commorragh'ı sağ salim terk eden zenolar, öyle ya da böyle Müfteris Kasırga Kabalı'ndan geri kalanların dikkatini çekti.
languages.original_text: Marazhai Aezyrraesh has not been forgotten by his underlings — or his enemies. The xenos who left Commorragh alive has drawn the attention of the remnants of the Kabal of the Reaving Tempest — for better or for worse.
